label: Household (M3/M4) 2016
description:
The influx of refugees to Germany, which rose sharply in the second half of 2015, poses challenges for public policy, government administration, and the population at large. To effectively coordinate lodging and assistance for these refugees and to foster their long-term integration into the labor market, educational system, and other societal spheres, robust and reliable information is needed that can be generalized and applied usefully to the challenges at hand. It is up to the empirical social research to provide a data base for these purposes.  
\  

To meet this need, the Institute for Employment Research (IAB) of the Federal Employment Agency, Research Centre on Migration, Integration, and Asylum of the Federal Office of Migration and Refugees (BAMF-FZ), and the Socio-Economic Panel (SOEP) at DIW Berlin are conducting a comprehensive standardized survey of refugees in Germany based on a qualitative preliminary study. Participation in the survey is voluntary, and the survey is being conducted by specially trained interviewers from the survey institute commissioned to do the fieldwork, TNS Sozialforschung in Munich. Conceptualized as a longitudinal study, the survey will be carried out in 2016, 2017, and 2018. In the first wave of the survey in 2016, the IAB-BAMF-SOEP Refugee Sample will cover nearly 2,000 adult refugees who arrived in Germany since 2013 seeking asylum.  
\  

**Questions about refugees’ living situations and the overall framework conditions**  
\  

The study looks at the living situations of refugees as well as their schooling, vocational training, and current occupational situations. It also collects information on refugees’ language use, living situations, family situations, social participation, and contact with both Germans and people of their own ethnic backgrounds. Other focal points of the study, which is conducted using standardized survey instruments, are the impacts of the legal and institutional frameworks for refugees and the effectiveness of various support programs.  
\  
 
**Project Manager**

Herbert Brücker (IAB)

Renate Leistner-Rocca (BAMF)

Martin Kroh & Jürgen Schupp (SOEP)  
\  

**Survey Management**

Elisabeth Liebau (SOEP)

Manuel Siegert (BAMF)

Ehsan Vallizadeh (IAB)  
\  

**Survey Institute**

Axel Glemser (TNS Infrastest Sozialforschung, Munich)

Andreas Stocker (TNS Infratest Sozialforschung, Munich)  
\  

**Survey Documentation**

Knut Wenzig (SOEP)
author: SOEP Group

To effectively coordinate lodging and assistance for these refugees and to foster their long-term integration into the labor market, educational system, and other societal spheres, robust and reliable information is needed that can be generalized and applied usefully to the challenges at hand. It is up to the empirical social research to provide a data base for these purposes.  
\  

To meet this need, the Institute for Employment Research (IAB) of the Federal Employment Agency, Research Centre on Migration, Integration, and Asylum of the Federal Office of Migration and Refugees (BAMF-FZ), and the Socio-Economic Panel (SOEP) at DIW Berlin are conducting a comprehensive standardized survey of refugees in Germany based on a qualitative preliminary study. Participation in the survey is voluntary, and the survey is being conducted by specially trained interviewers from the survey institute commissioned to do the fieldwork, TNS Sozialforschung in Munich. Conceptualized as a longitudinal study, the survey will be carried out in 2016, 2017, and 2018. In the first wave of the survey in 2016, the IAB-BAMF-SOEP Refugee Sample will cover nearly 2,000 adult refugees who arrived in Germany since 2013 seeking asylum.

**Questions about refugees’ living situations and the overall framework conditions**  
\  

The study looks at the living situations of refugees as well as their schooling, vocational training, and current occupational situations. It also collects information on refugees’ language use, living situations, family situations, social participation, and contact with both Germans and people of their own ethnic backgrounds. Other focal points of the study, which is conducted using standardized survey instruments, are the impacts of the legal and institutional frameworks for refugees and the effectiveness of various support programs.  
\  
 
**Project Manager**

Herbert Brücker (IAB)

Renate Leistner-Rocca (BAMF)

Martin Kroh & Jürgen Schupp (SOEP)

**Survey Management**

H1v.question: H1v
H1v.name: H1v
H1v.label: The first questions are about your household. When we ask questions about your household or persons in your household, this could mean you alone if you live alone in an apartment or an accommodation unit. However it can also mean the other people living there who together make up a household. As rule these are family members living together.

items.text_de: Zunächst geht es um Ihren Haushalt. Wenn wir Fragen zu Ihrem Haushalt oder zu Personen in Ihrem Haushalt stellen, können damit Sie alleine gemeint sein, wenn Sie alleine in einer Wohnung oder Wohneinheit leben. Es kann aber auch die Gemeinschaft gemeint sein, die zusammen einen Haushalt bildet. In der Regel sind das zusammenlebende Familienangehörige.
items.text: The first questions are about your household. When we ask questions about your household or persons in your household, this could mean you alone if you live alone in an apartment or an accommodation unit. However it can also mean the other people living there who together make up a household. As rule these are family members living together.

items.text_de: In welcher Art von Unterkunft wohnt die Befragungsperson?

H55.label: How much basic subsistence income for the elderly and for those with reduced earning capacity are you is or your household currently receiving per month?

items.text_de: Wie viel Grundsicherung im Alter und bei Erwerbsminderung erhalten Sie beziehungsweise Ihr Haushalt derzeit pro Monat?
items.text: How much basic subsistence income for the elderly and for those with reduced earning capacity are you is or your household currently receiving per month?

items.text_de: Euro
items.text: Euros

H56.question: H56
H56.name: H56
H56.label: Are you or is another member of the household currently receiving housing benefit (rent or charge subsidy)?

items.text_de: Erhalten Sie oder ein anderes Haushaltsmitglied derzeit Wohngeld (Miet- und Lastenzuschuss)?
items.text: Are you or is another member of the household currently receiving housing benefit (rent or charge subsidy)?

H57.question: H57
H57.name: H57
H57.label: How much housing benefit (rent or charge subsidy) are you or is your household currently receiving per month?

items.text_de: Wie viel Wohngeld (Miet- und Lastenzuschuss) erhalten Sie beziehungsweise Ihr Haushalt derzeit pro Monat?
items.instruction_de: Falls nicht in den Unterkunftskosten von ALG II, Laufender Hilfe zum Lebensunterhalt, Grundsicherung im Alter enthalten.
items.text: How much housing benefit (rent or charge subsidy) are you or is your household currently receiving per month?
items.instruction: If not included in accommodation expenses under unemployment benefit II / monthly subsistence... / basic income support for the elderly

items.text_de: Euro
items.text: Euros

H58.question: H58
H58.name: H58
H58.label: Taking all income together, how much is the current monthly net household income of all members of the household?

items.text_de: Wie hoch ist das monatliche Haushaltsnettoeinkommen aller Haushaltsmitglieder heute, wenn man alle Einkünfte zusammennimmt?
items.instruction_de: Wenn Sie es nicht genau wissen, schätzen Sie bitte.
items.text: Taking all income together, how much is the current monthly net household income of all members of the household?
items.instruction: If you don't know the exact amount, please state an approximate figure.

items.text_de: Euro
items.text: Euros

H59.question: H59
H59.name: H59
H59.label: In the last month, were the amounts of your household's income and expenses the same, or was income higher than expenses or were expenses higher than income?

items.text_de: Waren die Einnahmen und die Ausgaben Ihres Haushalts im letzten Monat gleich hoch oder waren die Einnahmen höher als die Ausgaben oder waren die Ausgaben höher als die Einnahmen?
items.text: In the last month, were the amounts of your household's income and expenses the same, or was income higher than expenses or were expenses higher than income?

answers.label_de: Einnahmen waren höher als die Ausgaben. Es konnten Ersparnisse gebildet werden.
answers.label: Income was higher than expenses. It was possible to save money.

answers.label_de: Ausgaben waren höher als die Einnahmen. Es entstand ein Fehlbetrag.
answers.label: Expense were higher than income. There was a shortfall.

answers.label_de: Einnahmen und Ausgaben waren gleich hoch.
answers.label: Income and expenses were the same

H60.question: H60
H60.name: H60
H60.label: How much were you or your household able to save last month?

items.text_de: Wie hoch war der Betrag, den Sie beziehungsweise Ihr Haushalt im letzten Monat sparen konnten?
items.instruction_de: Wenn Sie es nicht genau wissen, schätzen Sie bitte.
items.text: How much were you or your household able to save last month?
items.instruction: If you don't know the exact amount, please state an approximate figure.

items.text_de: Euro
items.text: Euros

H61.question: H61
H61.name: H61
H61.label: How much was the shortfall during the past month?

items.text_de: Wie hoch war der Fehlbetrag im letzten Monat?
items.instruction_de: Wenn Sie es nicht genau wissen, schätzen Sie bitte.
items.text: How much was the shortfall during the past month?
items.instruction: If you don't know the exact amount, please state an approximate figure.

items.text_de: Euro
items.text: Euros

H62.question: H62
H62.name: H62
H62.label: How did you or household make up for the shortfall?

items.text_de: Wie haben Sie beziehungsweise Ihr Haushalt den Fehlbetrag ausgeglichen?
items.instruction_de: Bitte geben Sie alles zutreffende an!
items.text: How did you or household make up for the shortfall?

items.text_de: Aufnahme eines Kredits
items.text: Took out a loan

items.text_de: Geld von Freunden, Verwandten oder Bekannten geliehen
items.text: Borrowed money from friends, relatives or aquaintances

items.text_de: Verbrauch vorhandener Ersparnisse
items.text: Used existing savings

items.text_de: Weiß nicht
items.text: Don't know

H63.question: H63
H63.name: H63
H63.label: Do you or does another person in your household have a bank account?

items.text_de: Verfügen Sie oder eine andere Person in Ihrem Haushalt über ein Bankkonto?
items.text: Do you or does another person in your household have a bank account?

H64.question: H64
H64.name: H64
H64.label: Since when have you or has another person in your household had a bank account in Germany?

items.text_de: Seit wann verfügen Sie oder eine andere Person in Ihrem Haushalt über ein Bankkonto in Deutschland?
items.instruction_de: Wenn mehrere Personen in Ihrem Haushalt über ein Bankkonto verfügen, ist das Erste gemeint.
items.text: Since when have you or has another person in your household had a bank account in Germany?
items.instruction: If several people in your household have a bank account, the first person is meant.

items.text_de: Jahr
items.text: Year

items.text_de: Monat
items.text: Month

H65.question: H65
H65.name: H65
H65.label: To what extent do you or does your household cover your requirements for food and other items of everyday use through contributions in kind received from other people?

items.text_de: In welchem Umfang decken Sie beziehungsweise Ihr Haushalt Ihren Bedarf an Lebensmitteln und anderen Dingen des täglichen Bedarfs über Sachleistungen, die Sie von Dritten bekommen?
items.text: To what extent do you or does your household cover your requirements for food and other items of everyday use through contributions in kind received from other people?

H66.question: H66
H66.name: H66
H66.label: To what extent do you or does your household use coupons to obtain food and other items of everyday use?

items.text_de: In welchem Umfang nutzen Sie beziehungsweise Ihr Haushalt Gutscheine, um sich mit Lebensmitteln und Dingen des täglichen Bedarfs zu versorgen?
items.text: To what extent do you or does your household use coupons to obtain food and other items of everyday use?

H67.question: H67
H67.name: H67
H67.label: To what extent do your or does your household cover your requirements for food and other items of daily use through normal shopping where you do not fall back on coupons or contributions in kind?

items.text_de: In welchem Umfang decken Sie beziehungsweise Ihr Haushalt Ihren Bedarf an Lebensmitteln und anderen Dingen des täglichen Bedarfs über normale Einkäufe, bei denen Sie nicht auf Sachleistungen oder Gutscheine zurückgreifen?
items.text: To what extent do your or does your household cover your requirements for food and other items of daily use through normal shopping where you do not fall back on coupons or contributions in kind?

H68.question: H68
H68.name: H68
H68.label: Which of the following points apply to your household?

items.text_de: Welche der folgenden Punkte treffen auf Ihren Haushalt zu?
items.text: Which of the following points apply to your household?

H69.question: H69
H69.name: H69
H69.label: The household has financial reserves for emergencies.

items.text_de: Der Haushalt hat finanzielle Rücklagen für Notfälle.
items.text: The household has financial reserves for emergencies.

H70.question: H70
H70.name: H70
H70.label: Friends are invited for a meal at least once per month.

items.text_de: Mindestens einmal im Monat werden Freunde zum Essen eingeladen.
items.text: Friends are invited for a meal at least once per month.

H71.question: H71
H71.name: H71
H71.label: A hot meal with meat, fish or poultry is eaten at least every two days.

items.text_de: Mindestens alle zwei Tage wird eine warme Mahlzeit mit Fleisch, Fisch oder Geflügel gegessen.
items.text: A hot meal with meat, fish or poultry is eaten at least every two days.

H72.question: H72
H72.name: H72
H72.label: At least once per month a leisure activity is pursued, such as going to the cinema, a concert, sporting event or similar.

items.text_de: Mindestens einmal im Monat wird einer Freizeitbeschäftigung wie Kino, Konzertbesuch, Sportveranstaltung oder Ähnlichem nachgegangen
items.text: At least once per month a leisure activity is pursued, such as going to the cinema, a concert, sporting event or similar.

H73.question: H73
H73.name: H73
H73.label: Worn-out furniture is renewed, even if it is still functional.

items.text_de: Abgenutzte Möbel, auch wenn sie noch funktionsfähig sind, werden durch neue ersetzt.
items.text: Worn-out furniture is renewed, even if it is still functional.

H74.question: H74
H74.name: H74
H74.label: Worn-out clothing is replaced with new clothing.

items.text_de: Abgetragene Kleidungsstücke werden durch neue ersetzt.
items.text: Worn-out clothing is replaced with new clothing.

H75.question: H75
H75.name: H75
H75.label: During the cold months the apartment is always warmly heated.

items.text_de: Die Wohnung wird in kalten Monaten angenehm warm beheizt.
items.text: During the cold months the apartment is always warmly heated.

H76.question: H76
H76.name: H76
H76.label: Everyone in the household has a small sum available for personal use each week.

items.text_de: Jeder im Haushalt hat wöchentlich einen kleinen Betrag für sich ganz persönlich zur Verfügung.
items.text: Everyone in the household has a small sum available for personal use each week.

H77.question: H77
H77.name: H77
H77.label: Everyone in the household owns at least two pairs of outdoor shoes in the right size (including an all-weather pair)

items.text_de: Jeder im Haushalt besitzt mindestens zwei Paar Straßenschuhe in passender Größe (einschließlich Allwetterpaar).
items.text: Everyone in the household owns at least two pairs of outdoor shoes in the right size (including an all-weather pair)

H78.question: H78
H78.name: H78
H78.label: Is there someone in your household who through reasons of age, health or disability needs constant help or care

items.text_de: Gibt es in Ihrem Haushalt jemanden, der aus Altersgründen, Krankheitsgründen oder wegen einer Behinderung dauernd hilfebedürftig oder pflegebedürftig ist?
items.text: Is there someone in your household who through reasons of age, health or disability needs constant help or care

H79.question: H79
H79.name: H79
H79.label: Are there children in your household who were not born until 1999 or after

items.text_de: Gibt es in Ihrem Haushalt Kinder, die erst im Jahr 1999 oder später geboren sind?
items.text: Are there children in your household who were not born until 1999 or after

H80.question: H80
H80.name: H80
H80.label: How many children who were born in 1999 or after are living in your household

items.text_de: Wie viele Kinder, die erst im Jahr 1999 oder später geboren sind, gibt es in Ihrem Haushalt?
items.text: How many children who were born in 1999 or after are living in your household

H80v.question: H80v
H80v.name: H80v
H80v.label: The following questions are asked for up to six children in the household. Please start with the oldest child born in 1999 or after and then work down by age, with the youngest child last.

items.text_de:
Die folgenden Fragen werden für bis zu sechs Kinder im Haushalt gestellt.
Beginnen Sie bitte mit dem ältesten Kind, das im Jahr 1999 oder danach geboren ist, und dann dem Alter nach, das jüngste Kind zuletzt.
items.text: The following questions are asked for up to six children in the household. Please start with the oldest child born in 1999 or after and then work down by age, with the youngest child last.

H80b.question: H80b
H80b.name: H80b
H80b.label: In which year was the oldest child born?

items.text_de: In welchem Jahr ist das älteste Kind geboren?
items.text: In which year was the oldest child born?

items.text_de: Jahr
items.text: Year

H81.question: H81
H81.name: H81
H81.label: What is this child's first name?

items.text_de: Wie ist der Vorname dieses Kindes?
items.text: What is this child's first name?

H82.question: H82
H82.name: H82
H82.label: Does this child currently go to school?

items.text_de: Besucht dieses Kind derzeit eine Schule?
items.text: Does this child currently go to school?

answers.label_de: Nein, ist schon zu alt, um eine Schule zu besuchen
answers.label: No, already too old to go to school

answers.label_de: Nein, ist noch zu jung, um zur Schule zu besuchen
answers.label: No, still too young to go to school

answers.label_de: Nein, besucht aus anderen Gründen keine Schule
answers.label: No, does not go to school for other reasons

H83.question: H83
H83.name: H83
H83.label: Which school does this child currently go to?

items.text_de: Welche Schule besucht dieses Kind derzeit?
items.text: Which school does this child currently go to?

H84.question: H84
H84.name: H84
H84.label: Does this child currently attend a special class for refugee children (for example, welcome class, preparatory class or transition class)?

items.text_de: Besucht dieses Kind derzeit eine spezielle Klasse für Flüchtlingskinder (zum Beispiel Willkommensklasse, Vorbereitungsklasse oder Übergangsklasse)?
items.text: Does this child currently attend a special class for refugee children (for example, welcome class, preparatory class or transition class)?

H85.question: H85
H85.name: H85
H85.label: Does this child receive special language assistance at school?

items.text_de: Bekommt dieses Kind spezielle Sprachförderung in der Schule?
items.text: Does this child receive special language assistance at school?

H86.question: H86
H86.name: H86
H86.label: Does this child usually attend school all day?

items.text_de: Besucht dieses Kind die Schule meistens ganztags?
items.text: Does this child usually attend school all day?

H87.question: H87
H87.name: H87
H87.label: Does this child attend a day care group or similar care facility at school?

items.text_de: Besucht dieses Kind einen Schulhort oder eine vergleichbare Betreuung in der Schule?
items.text: Does this child attend a day care group or similar care facility at school?

H88.question: H88
H88.name: H88
H88.label: Are there also other people (not members of the household) who regularly look after the child?

items.text_de: Gibt es daneben noch Personen (ohne Haushaltsangehörige), die dieses Kind regelmäßig betreuen?
items.text: Are there also other people (not members of the household) who regularly look after the child?

items.text_de: Ja, bezahlte Betreuungsperson kommt ins Haus
items.text: Yes, a paid carer comes to the house

items.text_de: Ja, Verwandte
items.text: Yes, relatives

items.text_de: Ja, Freunde / Bekannte / Nachbarn
items.text: Yes, friends/acquaintances/neighbours

items.text_de: Ja, ehrenamtlicher Betreuer
items.text: Yes, volunteer carers

items.text_de: Nein, nichts davon
items.text: No, none of these

H89.question: H89
H89.name: H89
H89.label: Does the child currently take part in one of more of the following activities outside school?

items.text_de: Nimmt dieses Kind derzeit an einer oder mehreren der folgenden Aktivitäten außerhalb der Schule teil?
items.text: Does the child currently take part in one of more of the following activities outside school?

items.text_de: Sprachförderung
items.text: Language assistance

items.text_de: Sport, Tanzen, Gymnastik, Ballett
items.text: Sports, dancing, gymnastics, ballet

items.text_de: Musikunterricht oder Gesangsunterricht
items.text: Music lessons or singing lessons

items.text_de: Kunsterziehung / Malen
items.text: Art classes / painting

items.text_de: Nein, nichts davon
items.text: No, none of the above

H90.question: H90
H90.name: H90
H90.label: Does this child currently attend a nursery, kindergarten or a child day care centre?

items.text_de: Besucht dieses Kind derzeit eine Kinderkrippe, einen Kindergarten oder eine Kindertageseinrichtung?
items.text: Does this child currently attend a nursery, kindergarten or a child day care centre?

H91.question: H91
H91.name: H91
H91.label: How many hours per day does this child attend the nursery, kindergarten or day care centre?

items.text_de: Wie viele Stunden besucht dieses Kind die Kinderkrippe, den Kindergarten oder die Kindertageseinrichtung pro Tag?
items.text: How many hours per day does this child attend the nursery, kindergarten or day care centre?

items.text_de: Stunden pro Tag
items.text: Hours per day

H92v.question: H92v
H92v.name: H92v
H92v.label: There are various reasons why parents have their children cared for only at home and not in a care facility. To what extent do the following statements apply to this child?

items.text_de: Es gibt verschiedene Gründe, warum Eltern ihre Kinder ausschließlich zu Hause und nicht in einer Einrichtung betreuen lassen. Wie sehr treffen bei Ihnen die folgenden Aussagen für dieses Kind zu?
items.text: There are various reasons why parents have their children cared for only at home and not in a care facility. To what extent do the following statements apply to this child?

H92.question: H92
H92.name: H92
H92.label: This child is not in a care facility as I did not get a place.

items.text_de: Dieses Kind ist in keiner Einrichtung, weil ich keinen Platz bekommen habe.
items.text: This child is not in a care facility as I did not get a place.

H93.question: H93
H93.name: H93
H93.label: This child is not in a care facility as I still consider it too young.

items.text_de: Dieses Kind ist in keiner Einrichtung, weil ich es noch für zu jung halte.
items.text: This child is not in a care facility as I still consider it too young.

H94.question: H94
H94.name: H94
H94.label: This child is not in a care facility as I want to bring it up myself.

items.text_de: Dieses Kind ist in keiner Einrichtung, weil ich es selbst erziehen möchte.
items.text: This child is not in a care facility as I want to bring it up myself.

H95.question: H95
H95.name: H95
H95.label: This child is not in a care facility as I want to bring it up in my first language.

items.text_de: Dieses Kind ist in keiner Einrichtung, weil ich es in meiner Herkunftssprache erziehen möchte.
items.text: This child is not in a care facility as I want to bring it up in my first language.

H96.question: H96
H96.name: H96
H96.label: This child is not in a care facility as it is not taught the religious or cultural values that are important to me.

items.text_de: Dieses Kind ist in keiner Einrichtung, weil es dort nicht die religiösen oder kulturellen Werte vermittelt bekommt, die mir wichtig sind.
items.text: This child is not in a care facility as it is not taught the religious or cultural values that are important to me.

H97.question: H97
H97.name: H97
H97.label: This child is not in a care facility as I am afraid it will be shunned because of its origin.

items.text_de: Dieses Kind ist in keiner Einrichtung, weil ich befürchte, dass es aufgrund seiner Herkunft ausgegrenzt wird.
items.text: This child is not in a care facility as I am afraid it will be shunned because of its origin.

H98.question: H98
H98.name: H98
H98.label: This child is not in a care facility as I am at home anyway and can look after it myself.

items.text_de: Dieses Kind ist in keiner Einrichtung, weil ich sowieso zu Hause bin und die Betreuung übernehmen kann.
items.text: This child is not in a care facility as I am at home anyway and can look after it myself.

H99.question: H99
H99.name: H99
H99.label: This child is not in a care facility as the costs are too high.

items.text_de: Dieses Kind ist in keiner Einrichtung, weil die Kosten dafür zu hoch sind.
items.text: This child is not in a care facility as the costs are too high.

H100.question: H100
H100.name: H100
H100.label: This child is not in a care facility as the nearest one is too far away.

items.text_de: Dieses Kind ist in keiner Einrichtung, weil die Entfernung zur nächsten Einrichtung zu groß ist.
items.text: This child is not in a care facility as the nearest one is too far away.

H101.question: H101
H101.name: H101
H101.label: This child is not in a care facility as the opening times do not suit me.

items.text_de: Dieses Kind ist in keiner Einrichtung, weil die Öffnungszeiten für mich nicht passen.
items.text: This child is not in a care facility as the opening times do not suit me.

H102.question: H102
H102.name: H102
H102.label: This child is not in a care facility as it takes up too much time to take it there and collect it again every day.

items.text_de: Dieses Kind ist in keiner Einrichtung, weil es zu aufwendig ist, es jeden Tag dort hinzubringen und wieder abzuholen.
items.text: This child is not in a care facility as it takes up too much time to take it there and collect it again every day.

H103.question: H103
H103.name: H103
H103.label: This child is not in a care facility as it has a chronic illness or a disability.

items.text_de: Dieses Kind ist in keiner Einrichtung, weil es eine chronische Krankheit oder eine Behinderung hat.
items.text: This child is not in a care facility as it has a chronic illness or a disability.

H104.question: H104
H104.name: H104
H104.label: This child is not in a care facility as it should spend as much time as possible with its siblings.

items.text_de: Dieses Kind ist in keiner Einrichtung, weil es möglichst viel Zeit mit den Geschwistern verbringen soll.
items.text: This child is not in a care facility as it should spend as much time as possible with its siblings.

H105.question: H105
H105.name: H105
H105.label: Do other people (not members of the household) also regularly look after this child?

items.text_de: Gibt es daneben noch Personen (ohne Haushaltsangehörige), die dieses Kind regelmäßig betreuen?
items.instruction_de: Bitte geben Sie alles zutreffende an!
items.text: Do other people (not members of the household) also regularly look after this child?

items.text_de: Ja, Tagesmutter außerhalb des Haushalts
items.text: Yes, childminder from outside the household

items.text_de: Ja, bezahlte Betreuungsperson kommt ins Haus
items.text: Yes, paid carer comes to the house

items.text_de: Ja, Verwandte
items.text: Yes, relatives

items.text_de: Ja, Freunde / Bekannte / Nachbarn
items.text: Yes, friends / acquaintances / neighbours

items.text_de: Ja, ehrenamtlicher Betreuer
items.text: Yes, voluntary carer

items.text_de: Nein, nichts davon
items.text: No, no none of theses

H106.question: H106
H106.name: H106
H106.label: Does this child currently take part in one or more of the following activities?

items.text_de: Nimmt dieses Kind derzeit an einer oder mehreren der folgenden Aktivitäten teil?
items.text: Does this child currently take part in one or more of the following activities?

items.text_de: Sprachförderung
items.text: Language assistance

items.text_de: Kinderturnen, Kindersport, Kinderschwimmen
items.text: Children's gymnastics, children's sport, children's swimming

items.text_de: Frühkindliche Musikerziehung
items.text: Early childhood music lessons

items.text_de: Künstlerische Aktivitäten (zum Beispiel Malen für Kinder, Kindertheater)
items.text: Artistic activities (for example painting for children, children's theatre)

items.text_de: Sonstige Eltern-Kind-Gruppe
items.text: Other parent-child group

items.text_de: Nein, nichts davon
items.text: No, none of these

H107.question: H107
H107.name: H107
H107.label: Does one or more of the following currently apply to this child?

items.text_de: Macht dieses Kind derzeit eines oder mehrere der folgenden Dinge?
items.text: Does one or more of the following currently apply to this child?

items.text_de: Wartet auf den Schulbeginn
items.text: Waiting for school or further education to start

items.text_de: Wartet auf den Berufsausbildungsbeginn
items.text: Waiting vocational training to start

items.text_de: Ist in einem Berufsvorbereitungsjahr, Berufsgrundbildungsjahr
items.text: Is in a vocational preparatory year, vocational basic education year

items.text_de: Besucht eine berufsbildende Schule
items.text: Attending a vocational training school

items.text_de: Ist in einer beruflichen Ausbildung / Lehre
items.text: Is in vocational training / apprenticeship

items.text_de: Ist erwerbstätig
items.text: Is working

items.text_de: Nichts davon
items.text: None of these

H108.question: H108
H108.name: H108
H108.label: Is this child currently receiving language assistance?

items.text_de: Bekommt dieses Kind derzeit eine Sprachförderung?
items.text: Is this child currently receiving language assistance?

H254.question: H254
H254.name: H254
H254.label:
That was the part of the questionnaire that was about your household and the people in your household
Household went. The following question is about you personally.

items.text_de:
Das war der Teil des Fragebogens, bei dem es um Ihren Haushalt und die Personen in Ihrem
Haushalt ging. Bei den nun folgenden Frage geht es um Sie persönlich.
items.text:
That was the part of the questionnaire that was about your household and the people in your household
Household went. The following question is about you personally.
